abstract: In what may be a case of sour grapes, JPMorgan is said to be ready to abandon plans to construct a new European headquarter’s in London’s Canary Warf, looking instead to move its operations to the old Lehman Brothers building in the British capital.
snippet: In what may be a case of sour grapes, JPMorgan is said to be ready to abandon plans to construct a new European headquarter’s in London’s Canary Warf, looking instead to move its operations to the old Lehman Brothers building in the British capita...
lead_paragraph: In what may be a case of sour grapes, JPMorgan is said to be ready to abandon plans to construct a new European headquarter’s in London’s Canary Wharf, looking instead to move its operations to the old Lehman Brothers building in the British capital, The Independent reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Eye Lehman’s London Offices
